title: Shivaji Surathkal 2: Mysterious case of Maayavi
overview: A serial killer is on the loose and the onus is on Karnatakaâ€™s Sherlock Holmes, Shivaji Surathkal, to catch him. The case becomes complex just when Shivaji is about to solve it. Four murders, a ticking clock and no clues; can Shivaji stop the next murder and save the victim?
